name: Ram Pratap Palace

reviews.title: Budget priced maraharaja's palace
reviews.text: The Rampratap palace hotel overlooks the Fateh Sagar lake, just north of Udaipur's main attractions. Its a rambling marble mansion with pleasant airy rooms with marble floors and lovely window seats overlooking the lake. There is a great garden restaurant on the lake side.

Staff are helpful and friendly and whilst this isnt the Lake Palace Hotel by any means, its a comfortable, clean pleasant place to stay to explore the city and its palaces. Our main complaint was a lack of hot water due to a defective bathroom heater. The bathrooms arent great but they are clean and the spacious room makes up for it
reviews.title: Very good hotel at reasonable prizes

reviews.text: We stayed at the Ram Pratap Palace in November and enjoyed it very much. The hotel is very clean, service very friendly, staff welcoming. We had a big nice room with two balconies. It was very calm also at night. We enjoyed the lakeview terrace and the cozy restaurant with good, reasonably prized food and good service. The hotel is in a good location, not in the busy center, but close to everything by car. Across the street they have their owen vintage car collection. The arrange for you a drive around the lake with a vintage car or a horse drawn carriage.
reviews.title: Simply Beautiful!

reviews.text: This is definitely one of the nicest hotels during our stay in India. We had a lakeview room which was spacious and clean. A very romantic hotel with a beautiful rooftop to have meals or simply to catch up for a drink. It helps when we were there during Diwali where we were absorbed into the festive celebrations with spectacular views of fireworks from the rooftop.
reviews.title: one of the nicest mid-range palace hotels in Rajasthan
Good, but not quite up to Maharaja standards
reviews.text: All the staffs were friendly and helpful and their service is one of the best we have had in India. The food were superb and reasonable and to top it off, the waiter that served us deserved a medal. A small guy with a cheerful smile, always ready to help. He is a darling.

description: Ram Pratap Palace located just off the lake Fateh Sagar in Udaipur "the city lakes and palaces", an enchanting budget hotel combines old World charm with modern comforts. Ideally located on the banks of the lake Fateh Sagar is the spacious Raaj Bagh Garden Restaurant, which is across the street from Hotel Rampratap Palace. The hotel is mere 5 kms away from the railway station and 25 kms from the airport. A friendly team of qualified therapists offers a full range of massage and beauty treatments. The palace hotel offers a breathtaking view of lake Fateh Sagar and the beautiful Aravalli ranges.
